name: pg_up
description: Whether the last scrape of PostgreSQL was able to connect to the server

name: pg_stat_database_numbackends
description: Number of backends currently connected to this database

name: pg_stat_database_xact_commit
description: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed

name: pg_stat_database_xact_rollback
description: Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back

name: pg_stat_database_blks_read
description: Number of disk blocks read in this database

name: pg_stat_database_blks_hit
description: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache

name: pg_stat_database_tup_returned
description: Number of rows returned by queries in this database

name: pg_stat_database_tup_fetched
description: Number of rows fetched by queries in this database

name: pg_stat_database_tup_inserted
description: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database

name: pg_stat_database_tup_updated
description: Number of rows updated by queries in this database

name: pg_stat_database_tup_deleted
description: Number of rows deleted by queries in this database

name: pg_stat_database_conflicts
description: Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database

name: pg_stat_database_temp_files
description: Number of temporary files created by queries in this database

name: pg_stat_database_temp_bytes
description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database

name: pg_stat_database_deadlocks
description: Number of deadlocks detected in this database

name: pg_stat_database_blk_read_time
description: Time spent reading data file blocks by backends in this database

name: pg_stat_database_blk_write_time
description: Time spent writing data file blocks by backends in this database

name: pg_stat_user_tables_n_tup_ins
description: Number of rows inserted

name: pg_stat_user_tables_n_tup_upd
description: Number of rows updated

name: pg_stat_user_tables_n_tup_del
description: Number of rows deleted

name: pg_stat_user_tables_n_live_tup
description: Estimated number of live rows

name: pg_stat_user_tables_n_dead_tup
description: Estimated number of dead rows

name: pg_stat_user_tables_n_mod_since_analyze
description: Estimated number of rows changed since last ANALYZE

name: pg_stat_user_tables_last_vacuum
description: Last time at which this table was manually vacuumed

name: pg_stat_user_tables_last_autovacuum
description: Last time at which this table was vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon

name: pg_stat_user_tables_last_analyze
description: Last time at which this table was manually analyzed

name: pg_stat_user_tables_last_autoanalyze
description: Last time at which this table was analyzed by the autovacuum daemon

name: pg_stat_user_tables_vacuum_count
description: Number of times this table has been manually vacuumed

name: pg_stat_user_tables_autovacuum_count
description: Number of times this table has been vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon

name: pg_stat_user_tables_analyze_count
description: Number of times this table has been manually analyzed

name: pg_stat_user_tables_autoanalyze_count
description: Number of times this table has been analyzed by the autovacuum daemon

name: pg_stat_user_indexes_idx_tup_read
description: Number of index entries returned by scans on this index

name: pg_stat_user_indexes_idx_tup_fetch
description: Number of live table rows fetched by simple index scans using this index

name: pg_stat_user_indexes_idx_scan
description: Number of index scans initiated on this index

name: pg_stat_activity_count
description: Number of connections in each state

name: pg_stat_activity_max_tx_duration
description: The maximum duration in seconds of any current transaction

name: pg_replication_lag
description: Replication lag behind master in seconds

name: pg_replication_lag_bytes
description: Replication lag behind master in bytes

name: pg_settings_max_connections
description: Maximum number of concurrent connections

name: pg_settings_shared_buffers
description: Amount of memory used for shared memory buffers

name: pg_settings_effective_cache_size
description: Effective size of the disk cache

name: pg_settings_work_mem
description: Amount of memory to be used by internal sort operations and hash tables

name: pg_settings_maintenance_work_mem
description: Amount of memory to be used by maintenance operations

name: pg_settings_wal_buffers
description: Amount of shared memory for WAL data

name: pg_settings_checkpoint_completion_target
description: Target duration of checkpoint spread

name: pg_settings_wal_keep_segments
description: Number of WAL segments to keep for replication

name: pg_settings_max_wal_size
description: Maximum size to let the WAL grow during automatic checkpoints

name: pg_settings_min_wal_size
description: Minimum size to shrink the WAL to during automatic checkpoints

name: pg_settings_random_page_cost
description: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a non-sequentially-fetched disk page

name: pg_settings_effective_io_concurrency
description: Number of concurrent I/O operations that the system can perform

name: pg_settings_max_worker_processes
description: Maximum number of concurrent worker processes

name: pg_settings_max_parallel_workers_per_gather
description: Maximum number of parallel workers per gather node

name: pg_settings_max_parallel_workers
description: Maximum number of parallel workers

name: pg_settings_max_parallel_maintenance_workers
description: Maximum number of parallel workers for maintenance operations
